archiefmat.titel: Brievenboek Commissariaat voor de Inlandse Bevolking
archiefmat.titel_eng: Letter book of the Office of Commissioners for the Indigenous Population
archiefmat.scope: Contains the text of outgoing letters to authorities and also to private individuals, regarding all sorts of questions related to the slave population (after 1863 the emancipated slaves under State supervision), maroons, and Amerindians.
archiefmat.notes:
Years 1858-1871 are missing. 

The data presented are based on a draft of the inventory of the archive (December 2008); numbers of the documents may change in the final version.
